attributes.action: be much more strict on immigration and asylum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our country is slowly being filled people seeking 'asylum', to get away from their own countries and live off benefits here. If our tax money is channelled away from benefits, it can be used for more important things, such as defence, education and the NHS.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
